301.name: Special Greedy Joker
301.description: Played cards with Diamond suit give +3 Mult when scored.

302.name: Special Lusty Joker
302.description: Played cards with Heart suit give +3 Mult when scored.

303.name: Special Wrathful Joker
303.description: Played cards with Spade suit give +3 Mult when scored.

304.name: Special Gluttonous Joker
304.description: Played cards with Club suit give +3 Mult when scored.

305.name: Special Jolly Joker
305.description: +8 Mult if played hand contains a Pair.

306.name: Special Zany Joker
306.description: +12 Mult if played hand contains a Three of a Kind.

307.name: Special Mad Joker
307.description: +10 Mult if played hand contains a Two Pair.

308.name: Special Crazy Joker
308.description: +12 Mult if played hand contains a Straight.

309.name: Special Droll Joker
309.description: +10 Mult if played hand contains a Flush.

310.name: Special Sly Joker
310.description: +50 Chips if played hand contains a Pair.

311.name: Special Wily Joker
311.description: +100 Chips if played hand contains a Three of a Kind.

312.name: Special Clever Joker
312.description: +80 Chips if played hand contains a Two Pair.

313.name: Special Devious Joker
313.description: +100 Chips if played hand contains a Straight.

314.name: Special Crafty Joker
314.description: +80 Chips if played hand contains a Flush.

315.name: Special Half Joker
315.description: +20 Mult if played hand contains 3 or fewer cards.

318.name: Special Fibonacci Joker
318.description: Each played Ace, 2, 3, 5, or 8 gives +8 Mult when scored.
